sentences.en: An uncertain but unceasing disquiet is upon me.
sentences.cn: 不知道什么缘故,我始终觉得心里七上八下的.

sentences.en: Disquiet that would boil over in the long run.
sentences.cn: 终有一天要爆发的不安情绪.

sentences.en: Europe's disquiet is likely to grow.
sentences.cn: 欧洲的不安可能会加剧.

sentences.en: He could not ease his disquiet.
sentences.cn: 他无法缓解忐忑不安的心绪.

sentences.en: Her disquiet made us uneasy too.
sentences.cn: 她的忧虑使我们也很不安.

sentences.en: I felt a prickle of disquiet.
Of course it was a brutal and harrowing time, but that isn't the reason for my disquiet.
sentences.cn: 那当然是一段残忍而痛苦的岁月，但这并非我不安的原因。

sentences.en: Recent reports speculated that disquiet among political and military elites over Kim's choice of successor was the real reason behind the meeting's delay.
sentences.cn: 近期有报道推测，金正日选择金正云做接班人导致政界和军界高层不安，是党代会推迟的真正原因。

sentences.en: The disquiet will boil over in the long run.
sentences.cn: 这种不安情绪终有一天会爆发的.

sentences.en: The strength of the dollar is causing considerable disquiet on the Stock Exchange.
sentences.cn: 美元表现坚挺在证券交易所中引起很大的不安.

sentences.en: There has been private disquiet at the club over two incidents this season.
sentences.cn: 本赛季发生了两件事让俱乐部有点不安.

sentences.en: There is considerable public disquiet about the safety of the new trains.
sentences.cn: 公众对新型列车的安全深感忧虑。

sentences.en: There is growing public disquiet about the cost of such policing.
sentences.cn: 公众对这种治安管理费用的不满情绪与日俱增。

sentences.en: These verbs mean to disturb or disquiet a person so as to evoke moderate anger.
sentences.cn: 这些动词的意思是打搅或扰乱某人使之生气.

sentences.en: They live as we all should live -- undisturbed , indifferent, and without disquiet.
sentences.cn: 他们过的才是理想的日子呐 -- 静谧, 淡漠 、 安宁.

words.tran_cn: 令人不安的；令人忧虑的

trans.tran_cn: 忧虑，不安，内心不平静，烦恼
